name: jassub
description: libass Subtitle Renderer and Parser library for browsers

scripts.bundle: vite build && npm run bundle-worker && npm run bundle-worker-legacy && node set-dist-pkg.js -c && npm run copy-files
scripts.bundle-worker: node set-dist-pkg.js && npm i ./dist && vite build --config vite-worker.config.js && npm remove jassub-wasm
scripts.bundle-worker-legacy: node set-dist-pkg.js -2 && npm i ./dist && vite build --config vite-worker-legacy.config.js && npm remove jassub-wasm
scripts.copy-files: shx cp dist/jassub*.js dist/js && shx cp dist/js/jassub-worker.wasm dist && shx cp dist/js/jassub-worker-legacy.js.mem dist/jassub-worker-legacy.mem
